recipe_card: Plant-Based Cream of Potato Soup
recipe_ingredients: [{"recipe_ingredients":"1 tablespoon olive oil"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 slices plant-based bacon, cut into 1-inch pieces"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 cup diced onion"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 cup diced carrots"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 cup diced celery"},{"recipe_ingredients":"4 tablespoons all-purpose flour, divided"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 teaspoon dried thyme"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste"},{"recipe_ingredients":"6 cups vegetable broth"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 large bay leaves"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ cup vegan butter"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 ½ cups almond milk"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 teaspoon dried parsley"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 teaspoon dried chives, or more to taste"}]
recipe_directions: [{"recipe_directions":"Heat oil in a 6-quart Dutch oven over medium heat. Add plant-based bacon and cook until crispy, 5 to 7 minutes. Add onion, carrots, and celery and cook for 3 minutes."},{"recipe_directions":"Reduce heat to medium-low. Add 3 tablespoons flour and cook, stirring continuously, until lumps are dissolved. Stir in potatoes, thyme, and pepper. Add broth and bay leaves. Increase heat to high and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 25 to 30 minutes."},{"recipe_directions":"While the soup is cooking, melt vegan butter in a skillet over low heat. Stir in remaining 1 tablespoon flour and cook until thickened, 1 to 2 minutes. Add milk. Cook, stirring constantly, over low to medium-low heat until mixture thickens to a cream-like consistency."},{"recipe_directions":"When the soup has finished cooking, pour in the vegan cream and simmer for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in parsley and chives and serve."}]
